entry.title: Korea Activity - CandlelyU Diffuser
entry.content:
Make a Natural Handmade Air Freshener.

Using natural ingredients to freshen the air in your home is a great way to absorb odors and create a nicely scented environment for your family.

Let’s make a ‘Marine’ air freshener!!

entry.title: About Newplans
entry.content: Hi. I’m Surim working as a travel planner and activity recommender. I will make you the most unforgettable memory during your trip to Korea. Do you want to know Korea?
